span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 卷入，纠缠： to twist together into a usually confused mass
【例】 we managed to entangle the string of lights into a hopeless mess of wires
【近】 interlace, intertwist, knot, snarl, tangle
【考法 2】 v. 使变复杂或困难： to make complex or difficult
【例】 the history is entangled by variant accounts
【近】 complexify, perplex, sophisticate
【反】 simplify, streamline 简化
【记】 tangle 纠纷
